title: How to upgrade WildFly JSF version with Galleon
content: This article will teach you how to add MyFaces 4 (or newer) support to your WildFly installation using Galleon features pack. At the end of it, you will be able to complete the upgrade of your JSF implementation in no time! Choosing a different JSF Implementation in WildFly Out of the box, WildFly ships with ...  The post appeared first on .
